= How to convert Mediawiki text to plain text =
The PlainTextConverter can convert simple Mediawiki texts to plain text.

Example:
{{{
package info.bliki.wiki;

import info.bliki.wiki.filter.PlainTextConverter;
import info.bliki.wiki.model.WikiModel;

public class PlainTextConverterExample {
	public static final String TEST = "This is a [[Hello World]] '''example'''";

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		WikiModel wikiModel = new WikiModel("http://www.mywiki.com/wiki/${image}", "http://www.mywiki.com/wiki/${title}");
		String htmlStr = wikiModel.render(new PlainTextConverter(), TEST);
		System.out.print(htmlStr);
	}
}
}}}
